job_history.work_description: Verified details of transactions, including tenant allowance requests and lease verification. Coded the general ledger and processed vendor invoice payments. Coordinated approval processes of all accounts payable invoices including tenant allowance requests and commission payments. Conducted month-end balance sheet reviews and reconciled any variances.

Responsible for office management including new hires/rehires. Responsible for processing invoices and creating purchase orders for approval. Assisting with union payroll processing. Responsible for running financial reports for management review.

Responsible for all Accounts Payable using Foundation software. Responsible for all Accounts Receivable including AIA billings, lien waivers, and payment postings. Responsible for Payroll including union reporting. General Ledger journal entries as needed.

Calculated figures such as discounts, percentage allocations and credits. Verified details of transactions, including funds received and total account balances. Coded the general ledger and processed vendor invoice payments. Coordinated approval processes of all accounts payable invoices. Balanced batch summary reports for verification and approval. Researched and resolved billing and invoice problems.

Comprehensive management of the Accounts Payable function for a $40 million General Contractor. Responsible for compilation of extensive loan draw packages and respective documentation reviewed and approved by banks, owners/developers, architects, construction control companies and owners representatives. Worked closely with the Controller, Contract Administrator, and Project Managers insuring billing accuracy. Close interaction with sub-contractors ensuring proper documentation submitted with monthly billings. Completed annual certified courses covering aspects of Nevada Revised Statutes pertaining to Nevada lien and contract law.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in various accounting roles, including project accountant, staff accountant, and office administrator, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Has comprehensive experience managing accounts payable functions, including processing vendor invoices, coordinating approval processes, and resolving billing and invoice problems, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Accounts Receivable
skills.explanation: Has experience managing accounts receivable, including AIA billings, lien waivers, and payment postings, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with payroll processing, including union reporting, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has experience running financial reports for management review, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: General Ledger Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with general ledger journal entries, coding, and processing vendor invoice payments, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Office Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience with office management, including new hires/rehires, processing invoices, and creating purchase orders, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Although not explicitly mentioned, has worked closely with various teams and individuals, including controllers, contract administrators, and project managers, suggesting some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Although not explicitly mentioned, it is likely that Microsoft Excel was used for managing financial records and payroll, but without explicit mention, the level cannot be determined.
